CustomField.description:
Run this after uploading wash data into DNC Wash Register - with the CSV of washed numbers from ACMA.
This update will 1. Match each Phone number in the DNC Wash Register to Leads and/or Contacts 2. Update the DNC status and wash date of the found Leads/Contacts
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("javascript:if(typeof(srcUp)=='function') {srcUp('/apex/DNCPhoneUpdate?s=false'); } else {window.location.assign('/apex/DNCPhoneUpdate?s=true') }", "Open new window, click Update button")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Run this after uploading wash data into DNC Wash Register - with the CSV of washed numbers from ACMA.
CustomField.label: Update Lead/Contact numbers
